links.*: The Lost Road and Other Writings

wikitext.*:
'''KWAR''' is a [[Common Eldarin]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "squeeze, clench".<ref name=PM>{{PM|Dwarves}}, p. 318 (note 7)</ref><ref name=VT>{{VT|47a}}, pp. 8, 22 (note 21)</ref><ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}, pp. 42, 158 (root appearing as "√KWĂR-")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Primitive Quendian]]: ''[[kwāra|kwāră, kwārē]]''<ref name=VT/><ref name=PE17/>
**Quenya: ''[[quár|quár, quáre]]''<ref name=VT/><ref name=PE17/>
**[[Telerin]]: ''[[pār]]''<ref name=VT/>
**[[Sindarin]]: ''[[paur#Sindarin|paur]]''<ref name=VT/>

==Other versions==

In the ''[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]]'' appears the root KWAR, signifying "clutching hand, fist". Among its derivatives are:<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 366</ref>

*Quenya: [[quár#Other verions|''qár'', ''qáre'']] 
*[[Kornoldorin|Old Noldorin]]: ''pōre''<ref>{{VT|45a}}, p. 24</ref>
**[[Noldorin]] ''[[paur#Noldorin|paur]]''

{{references}}
